attributes.additional_details: Theres proven facts that the people who do use cannabis is less likely to cuase arguements and bother others unlike people who are drinking as they cuase fights and damage property witch takes up the polices time and money as they could be dealing with other activities it also helps People who do have ADHD and people with other similar anger or special needs
attributes.background: Theres scientific studies that show the use of cannabis can kill cancer cells and they also can help people with mental health issues or people who have anger issues e.g ADHD, Autism and others. that some people do use the drug that helps them to keep them calm and help them to foucs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Legalise cannabis and expunge previous convictions for possession:
